faqs.q: How to get registered on Amazon?
faqs.a: Please register yourself by clicking here → 'Sign up'. Keep PAN, GSTIN, bank acct, phone/email, pickup address, and brand docs ready. Complete business details, tax info, deposit method, and verify OTP. After approval, add products and shipping settings.

faqs.q: How to raise seller support case?
faqs.a: Seller Support Case: Login to your Seller Central Account → check for “Help” (top right) → 'Get support' → Selling on Amazon → pick topic → 'Contact us'. Choose email/chat/call, describe the issue, attach screenshots, submit. Track under 'Case log'.

Login: Visit sellercentral.amazon.in → Sign in with your registered email/phone and password. If 2 Step verification is enabled, keep your phone handy for OTP. Enter OTP & Login. Trouble? Use 'Forgot password' and ensure the correct marketplace (IN).

1. Inventory → Manage All Inventory → search SKU → 'Edit' → 'Offer' tab. Update 'Your price' and 'Quantity' then Save. 
2. For bulk: Inventory → Add Products via Upload → Price/Inventory file → upload, or use API – integration for getting inventory and pricing updates automatically.

Login into your Seller Central account → Menu (Top Left) → Orders → Manage Orders → 'Pending/Unshipped/Cancelled'. Click an order ID to view details, contact customer and share KYC/Insurance & RTO docs. After collecting docs and RTO/Insurance charges, click Self Deliver → Print invoice/packing slip.

faqs.q: Which app need to be downloaded for scanning?
faqs.a: For Android: Amazon Track App. For iPhone: Amazon Track App. Why important? • Provides tracking info to customers → better feedback. • Enables sellers to maintain delivery performance for Local Shops & Prime. Pre-requisites: • Seller account on Seller Central • Delivery agent with Android ≥7.0 and IN phone number • Opted into Self-Delivery workflow • Configured 'Ships-from Location' in Buy Shipping preferences → Settings > Account Info > Buy Shipping Preferences. How to update deliveries: 1. Out for Delivery scan 2. Delivered / Attempt / Rejected scan (before 10PM same day).

faqs.q: How to deliver vehicle to customer?
faqs.a: Login into Seller Central → Orders → Click Order ID → Collect KYC/RTO docs and charges for RTO/Insurance → Click Self Delivery → Enter dimensions → Print Packaging slip → Do 1st Scan → Wait 1 hour → Deliver vehicle → Do 2nd Scan → Delivery complete.
Payments: Reports → Payments → 'Statement view' for settlements, 'All statements' for history, 'Transaction view' for per-order fees/credits. Download reports for reconciliation.

faqs.q: What are Cancellation Charges if orders are cancelled/ Not delivered?
faqs.a:
1. Failure to accept order before ship date → auto-cancel → Up to 150% of Selling on Amazon fee.
2. Dealer/Brand Cancelling order without buyer communication → Up to 150% of Selling on Amazon fee.
3. Late delivery (after Expected Date of Delivery) → Entire product price (risk of A-to-Z claim refund).
Buyer–Seller Messages: Performance → Customer Messages (or Messages icon). Reply within SLA 48 hours, avoid restricted info, attach docs/screenshots if needed.
Shipping Template: Settings → Shipping → Create/Edit template. Set service levels, regions/pincodes, handling time. Assign SKUs via 'Manage Inventory' → 'Edit' offer → choose template.
Notifications: Settings → Notification Preferences. Enable email/SMS/app alerts for orders, returns, performance. In-app: Bell icon (top right).
All Dealers receive payment within 3+1 days from delivery date (only if SOPs are followed).
Amazon Fees: 2% (of Ex-Showroom Price) + 100 INR for Bikes & Scooters.
